mapper.insert: insert into club_board values(#{cb_club_id}, club_board_seq.nextval, #{cb_writer}, #{cb_title}, #{cb_contents}, null, sysdate, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from (select club_board.*, row_number() over(order by cb_seq desc) rn from club_board where cb_club_id = #{cb_seq}) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from (select club_board.*, row_number() over(order by cb_seq desc) rn from club_board where cb_club_id = #{seq})
mapper.update: update club_board set cb_view_count = cb_view_count + 1 where cb_seq = #{value}
